document_title: Nummular eczema: Causes, signs, diagnosis, prevention
subsection_content:
The exact cause of nummular eczema has not yet been found, however nummular eczema patients are often related to the following factors:
Allergy.; Bacterial infection (Staphylococcus...); Contact with rough fabrics.; Dry skin or sitting a lot in cold, dry environments; Or take a hot bath.; Skin injuries such as burns, scratches, insect stings; Using irritating soap dries out the skin.
